oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SPECTRAL. COMPUTATIONS ON PRESSURE WAVE GAUGE RECORDS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: de Carvalho, Manuel Mandes
Ramos, Fernando Silveira
Moraes, Carlos de Campos
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: spectral computation
wave pressure
pressure gauge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: With a view to establish sea wave data processing procedures to be applied to records obtained at the Portuguese coast, a detailed study is made of different choices of certain parameters used in one-dimensional spectral analysis of a pressure wave gauge record Statistics computed by the selected spectral procedure are then compared with results of a Tucker-Draper analysis of the same record Finally a hindcast of sea conditions for the date and place of the record is made by different methods and comparisons with previous results are presented.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 12 (1970): Proceedings of 12th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Washington, D.C., 1970.; 5
